name: Herbal Hunter
description:
Embark on a mystical journey with Henry, an enigmatic hero exploring the secrets of a celestial mountain. Experience nature's beauty, become one with it, and master herbalism to unravel legendary mysteries concealed within. The adventure unfolds with Henry's extraordinary abilities and your unwavering determination.

Main Game Features:

- Collect items with the ability to see far and jump high.

- Collect as much as possible within the given time.

- Uncover secrets, solve puzzles, and discover treasures.

- You earn points based on the amount you collect.
